summary: The video showcases the creation of simple desktop applications with a cute aesthetic. It demonstrates examples like an egg timer and a tic-tac-toe game. The creator mentions that they have a full step-by-step tutorial on their YouTube channel, covering setup to coding and styling, and also offers a template code on GitHub. The video ends with the creator waving goodbye.
content_theme: Technology, DIY/Crafts, Coding Tutorials, Home Improvement
on_screen_text: Easy cute little desktop app tutorial
How to code yr first little desktop app from scratch (beginner friendly & cozy aesthetic :3)
Figma design file for this project:
transcript: the desktop applications like these? this is how to make your very first desktop application, super beginner friendly. I have a full step-by-step tutorial on my YouTube from how to set up everything that you'll need to coding and styling your very first desktop app. Or if you just want to grab a template code. They are also on my GitHub. Happy coding! Bye <3
